title: What does Prisoner Express do?
answer: Prisoner Express provides educational programs, resources, and support to incarcerated individuals.

title: How does Prisoner Express programs operate?
answer: Currently, we offer up to 9 programs in every 6-month cycle, and each program has between 500 to 900 participants. It makes for a continually growing photocopying and postage bill.

title: How to access current programs?
answer: To access current programs, please visit our website and navigate to the Programs section.

title: How to participate in a program you are interested in?
answer: To participate in a program, you can sign up through our website and follow the instructions provided.

title: How to visit your past works of other prisoners?
answer: To visit the past works of other prisoners, you can explore our online archives or request access to physical copies if available.

title: How to submit works?
answer: To submit works, please mail your works to CTA / Durland Alternatives Library, Prisoner Express, PO Box #6556, Ithaca, NY 14851.
